data.title: Beatrice Jean: Bryce Dallas Howard, Seth Gabel Welcome Baby Girl
data.meta_description: It's A Girl For Bryce Dallas Howard!
data.text:
It's a girl for Bryce Dallas Howard and husband Seth Gabel!

"The Help" actress gave birth Jan. 19, her father Ron Howard announced on Twitter Saturday.

"Beatrice Jean Howard-Gabel Born Jan 19 2012 8lbs 6oz," the happy grandfather tweeted. "Bryce & Baby B are spectacular Daddy Seth & brother Theo are beaming ear to ear :-)"

"Beatrice's arrival is hugely exciting for our family," he added, thanking friends and fans for their congratulations.

Advertisement

Baby Beatrice joins big brother, Theo, who will be 5 next month.

Howard wasn't shy about showing off her very pregnant belly while promoting several projects this year, including "The Help" in August and "50/50" this fall.

"It's so much easier to be pregnant the second time around," she told Access Hollywood, "because you're not as worried about things and you know what to expect."
